EmailTemplate.name: Case Emails For Non-Members -CA-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: We'll be in touch (ID: {!Case.Thread_Id})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.FirstName},
We've received your inquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
While you wait for our Customer Support team to get back to you, we invite you to visit our help pages at https://my.dazn.com/help/CA-en, where you can find information and solutions to the most common problems.
If you were able to resolve your issue, it would be great if you could reply to this email with a quick “I no longer need help.” That way, we can close your inquiry without further contact.
Otherwise, our Customer Support team will get in touch with you within 24 hours.
Best regards, Your DAZN Team
